description_bullets: Developed and deployed convolutional multi-task learning models for autonomous driving perception, including segmentation, 2D, and 3D object detection.
Trained models using PyTorch with multi-GPU support and Determined AI for scalable training and inference.
Optimized and deployed algorithms to NVIDIA platforms using ONNX and TensorRT, enabling real-time end-to-end perception solutions.
Improving robustness and resilience of deep neural networks.
Developed graph neural network models for Electronic Design Automation task.
Developed different deep learning models for NLP tasks and built necessary services for web application.
Worked on milk production data and built models with RNNs. Analyzed cow location data.
Worked on Big Data with Laravel and MongoDB. Practised data mining and some machine learning algorithms in Python and Azure Machine Learning Studio.
Worked on an Android application called Miks Invest.
The goal of the team is making web applications for the events of COMPEC: Bogazici Bilisim Odulleri, Bogazici Tech-summit.
